Hi there!

You have stumbled upon Sara Salloum's portfolio

I am a designer, developer and maker. My realm lies somewhere between technology and art, shifting from one to the other, as well as combining the two. You may find me immersed in weaving a rug, designing a tattoo, or working on web development to name a few. Regardless of the field, you will certainly find me learning new things and building on what I have experience with.

Want to work together? Get in touch!

You can also check out my GitHub or get in touch on LinkedIn
